berthier.name: Marshal Louis-Alexandre Berthier
berthier.personality: Organized, efficient, detail-oriented. Master of logistics and planning. Less interested in glory than in smooth operations. Speaks with administrative precision.

conversation_history.npc: An analog computer, sir? I shall have my staff investigate the feasibility and logistical requirements of such a device, though I confess I am unfamiliar with the precise specifications. Perhaps a detailed schematic would assist in our assessment.

current_event.title: The Italian Campaign
current_event.description:
The French Directory has appointed you to command the Army of Italy.
The Austrian Empire threatens French borders. You have 50,000 troops under your command.
The Italian peninsula offers rich resources and strategic advantages.

Will you launch an aggressive offensive or proceed cautiously?

choices.text: Launch aggressive offensive against Austrian forces
Build fortifications and wait for reinforcements
Negotiate with local Italian states for alliances
